import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react" import NavBar from "../../nav-bar"; import {Link, useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import petService from "../../../services/admin-service/pet-service" import sessionUserService from "../../../services/user-service" const PetReport = () => { const {userId} = useParams(); const [newPet, setNewPet] = useState({ // userId: userId, name: "", gender: "female", age: 0, breed: "", image: "", description: "", status: "missing", city: "", state: "", zipcode: "" }) const [showReportForm, setShowReportForm] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { sessionUserService.profile().then(user=>{ if(user && user.username !== null){ setShowReportForm(true) }else { setShowReportForm(false) } }) }, []) return

Report Missing Pet

{ showReportForm && <>
setNewPet({...newPet, name:event.target.value})}/>
setNewPet({...newPet, breed:event.target.value})}/>
setNewPet({...newPet, age:event.target.value})}/>
setNewPet({...newPet, city:event.target.value})}/>
setNewPet({...newPet, state:event.target.value})}/>
setNewPet({...newPet, zipcode:event.target.value})}/>
setNewPet({...newPet, image:event.target.value})}/>
